title: Start
body:
Why do you like living in the great state of Maine? 
[[I like the cold weather!|cold]] [[Its so green here!|green]]

title: green
body: Its so pretty here, all the mountains and trees!<<set $whichPicture = "2" >>

title: cold
body: I LOVE being around snow, dont be such a wimp!<<set $whichPicture = "1" >>
